name: St. Nick Sour
description: At first glance the St. Nick Sour may look like a simple twist on the classic Whiskey Sour—substitute orgeat for sugar, and introduce some orange juice to the mix--but these small changes make a surprisingly engaging drink.

recipeInstructions.text: Shake with ice and pour, unstrained, into an Old Fashioned glass. Garnish with spiral-cut orange and lemon peels.
